member.summary: The service which this resource belongs to.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.UrlNotificationsResource.GetMetadata
member.summary: Gets metadata about a Web Document. This method can _only_ be used to query URLs that were previously seen in successful Indexing API notifications. Includes the latest `UrlNotification` received via this API.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.UrlNotificationsResource.GetMetadataRequest
member.summary: Gets metadata about a Web Document. This method can _only_ be used to query URLs that were previously seen in successful Indexing API notifications. Includes the latest `UrlNotification` received via this API.

member.summary: Notifies that a URL has been updated or deleted.

member.summary: Notifies that a URL has been updated or deleted.

member.summary: Gets or sets the body of this request.

member.summary: Description of the notification events received for this URL.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotification
member.summary: `UrlNotification` is the resource used in all Indexing API calls. It describes one event in the life cycle of a Web Document.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotification.NotifyTime
member.summary: Creation timestamp for this notification. Users should _not_ specify it, the field is ignored at the request time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotification.Type
member.summary: The URL life cycle event that Google is being notified about.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotification.Url
member.summary: The object of this notification. The URL must be owned by the publisher of this notification and, in case of `URL_UPDATED` notifications, it _must_ be crawlable by Google.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotificationMetadata
member.summary: Summary of the most recent Indexing API notifications successfully received, for a given URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Indexing.v3.Data.UrlNotificationMetadata.Url
member.summary: URL to which this metadata refers.
